name: @laylazi/bootstrap-rtl-scss
description: SCSS resources of Bootstrap 4.x RTL for theming purposes
author: Arash Laylazi <arash@laylazi.ir>

scripts.css-compile: node-sass --output-style expanded --source-map true --source-map-contents true --precision 6 scss/ -o dist/css/
scripts.css-minify-main: cleancss --level 1 --format breakWith=lf --source-map --source-map-inline-sources --output dist/css/bootstrap.min.css dist/css/bootstrap.css && cleancss --level 1 --format breakWith=lf --source-map --source-map-inline-sources --output dist/css/bootstrap-grid.min.css dist/css/bootstrap-grid.css && cleancss --level 1 --format breakWith=lf --source-map --source-map-inline-sources --output dist/css/bootstrap-reboot.min.css dist/css/bootstrap-reboot.css
scripts.css-minify-rtl: cleancss --level 1 --format breakWith=lf --source-map --source-map-inline-sources --output dist/css/bootstrap-rtl.min.css dist/css/bootstrap-rtl.css && cleancss --level 1 --format breakWith=lf --source-map --source-map-inline-sources --output dist/css/bootstrap-grid-rtl.min.css dist/css/bootstrap-grid-rtl.css && cleancss --level 1 --format breakWith=lf --source-map --source-map-inline-sources --output dist/css/bootstrap-reboot-rtl.min.css dist/css/bootstrap-reboot-rtl.css
scripts.refresh: npm update -f && npm install -f && npm audit fix -f && npm rebuild -f
